long_description: The Arc'teryx Quintic 38 snow pack is an efficient load carrier for the backcountry. It's designed for snow, yet underscores the idea that a backpack is an everyday tool, not a specialized accessory. Lowered, flat pack body centralizes the load around your core to distribute weight and keep it low in the lumbar area; narrow top and wide bottom center weight on the hips. Separate compartments help keep gear sorted, easy to access and balanced during travel; individual attachment points hold full-face or half-shell helmets and poles. External strap configuration accommodates A-frame or diagonal carry of skis and split, horizontal or vertical carry of a snowboard. Side-load main compartment is easily accessible in transit; separate compartments keep shovel, safety gear, food and extras balanced and organized. The Arc'teryx Quintic 38 snow pack features a top pocket for skins and goggles; a side water-bottle pocket and a top-loading tool kit compartment with sleeves for each item.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Quintic 38 snow pack is an efficient load carrier for the backcountry. It's designed for snow, yet underscores the idea that a backpack is an everyday tool, not a specialized accessory.
